==Useful Info==
The '''neqoxec''' is a particularly dangerous tier-[[3]] [[demon]]. Although it doesn't deal much damage directly, it will gladly [[malmutate]] you and drain your [[MP]]. They are found in [[the Abyss]] and [[Pandemonium]] (particularly in [[Mnoleg]]'s domain), and can be summoned by other monsters with the [[Summon Demon]] spell.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Neqoxecs require a clear line of fire to mutate you, so keep other monsters or summoned allies in the way to block them.
**If that isn't an option, neqoxecs also cannot [[see invisible]]; a source of invisibility will provide at least some protection in a pinch.
**Their Brain Bite doesn't require a line of fire, however. Casters should watch out.
*Fortunately, they're fragile and have few resistances. Take them out first whenever possible.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], neqoxecs had [[Brain Feed]] instead of [[Brain Bite]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], neqoxecs had [[Summon Minor Demon]].
